title: Interview with Professor Carolyn Jackson
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Professor Carolyn Jackson from Lancaster university about her classic lads and ladettes research and then her most recent publication entitled; Lad Culture in HE: Sexism, Sexual Harassment and Violence.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks to Professor Carolyn Jackson from Lancaster university about her classic lads and ladettes research and then her most recent publication entitled; Lad Culture in HE: Sexism, Sexual Harassment and Violence.
